trends: There have been 63 other sightings in Fresno
There were no other sightings in Fresno on or around February 24th 2009
divs: Sighting DetailsMy wife and I woke up to check on our son because he was running a fever. It was exactly 2:00 A.M. Tuesday Morning.As I walked pass a window with no blinds, I saw I bright light traveling up and fire underneath. To me it looked like a space shuttle launch but from a far away. I yelled at my wife where she ran to the window and we both continued looking at it for about 1-2 min. We lost sight of it as it dissappeared in the sky leaving a trail of smoke. We were looking South of Fresno. Their is Lemoore air base but that is more South-West of Fresno. Was there a missle launch anywhere South of Fresno or on the Coast like Vandeberg air base?
